name: LITERARY MUG - SHAKESPEARE'S DRAGON
description:
Fine bone china mug printed and decorated by hand in Stoke on Trent.  Part of a range featuring mythical creatures accompanied by quotes from English authors & poets.  

ILLUSTRATION OF:  An enraged dragon on the front irritated by some pesky butterflies fluttering about in the mug interior.  

QUOTE/ INSPIRATION FROM:  King Lear by William Shakespeare.           
Written around the illustration and on an attached label the quote reads:  'Come not between the dragon and his wrath.'  

BLUE AND YELLOW COLOUR
The key colour is a beautiful purple-blue, which as light travels through bone china, appears to alter with the changing light.

DIMENSIONS
½ pint capacity.  8.9 cm tall.  8.5 cm wide.

CARE INSTRUCTIONS
Dishwasher and microwave safe.  To maintain the glaze vibrancy it is preferable that a gentle detergent & short or low temperature wash program is used.

DELIVERY  
UK Standard Recorded: £3 flat delivery charge.
Outside the UK: £12 flat delivery charge. 

There's no need to worry about Christmas wrapping; if you order by December 20th you will receive a free Christmas gift box for your mugs!   

Parcels are usually posted the next working day after an order is received.  If you're in a hurry please ask for quotations for 1st Class or Next Day delivery services.


Matching gift cards and jugs are available.

name: LITERARY CARD - TENNYSON'S MERMAID
description:
Gift card printed in Wolverhampton, England.  Part of a range featuring mythical creatures accompanied by quotes from English authors & poets.  

ILLUSTRATION OF:  An incredibly vain mermaid, lounging in a sea shell while contemplating her own beauty. 

QUOTE/ INSPIRATION FROM:  The Mermaid by Lord Alfred Tennyson.
Written around the illustration the quote reads: 
‘Who would be  A mermaid fair,  Singing alone,  Combing her hair’, 

INSIDE:  Blank.  
If you order a card alongside any ceramic product and would like to have it sent directly as a gift, a message can be written inside for you at no extra cost.  (In the same style calligraphy as the quote on the front.)  Please ask when you place your order. 

DIMENSIONS
5" x 7" (12.7 cm x 17.8 cm).

UK STANDARD RECORDED DELIVERY  
Cards ordered alone: £0.90 flat delivery charge.  
Cards ordered with ceramics: No extra cost.  (£3 flat delivery charge.)

DELIVERY OUTSIDE THE UK
£12 flat delivery charge. 

Parcels are usually posted the next working day after an order is received.  Matching mugs and jugs are available.

name: LITERARY JUG - LEWIS CARROLL'S UNICORN
description:
Fine bone china jug printed and decorated by hand in Stoke on Trent.  Part of a range featuring mythical creatures accompanied by quotes from English authors & poets.  

ILLUSTRATION OF:  The impertinent Unicorn encountered by Lewis Carroll's Alice, galloping through the waves on the front and also splashing around on the back of the jug.  

QUOTE/ INSPIRATION FROM:  Through the Looking-Glass, and What Alice Found There by Lewis Carroll.  The quote reads: Said the Unicorn, ‘if you’ll  believe in me, I’ll believe in you. Is that a bargain?’  This is written around the illustration and a longer extract from the story can be read from an attached label. 

BLUE AND YELLOW COLOUR
The key colour is a beautiful purple-blue, which as light travels through bone china, appears to alter with the changing light.

DIMENSIONS
½ pint capacity.   10.7 cm tall.  9.2 cm wide.

CARE INSTRUCTIONS
Dishwasher and microwave safe.  To maintain the glaze vibrancy it is preferable that a gentle detergent & short or low temperature wash program is used.

DELIVERY  
UK Standard Recorded: £3 flat delivery charge.
Outside the UK: £12 flat delivery charge. 

Arrives well wrapped in a sturdy box.  

Parcels are usually posted the next working day after an order is received.  If you're in a hurry please ask for quotations for 1st Class or Next Day delivery services.


Matching gift cards and mugs are available.

name: LITERARY MUG - TENNYSON'S MERMAID
description:
Fine bone china mug printed and decorated by hand in Stoke on Trent.  Part of a range featuring mythical creatures accompanied by quotes from English authors & poets.  

ILLUSTRATION OF:  An incredibly vain mermaid contemplating her own beauty while a jellyfish floats in the mug interior (or in your tea when you drink from it).  

QUOTE/ INSPIRATION FROM:  The Mermaid by Lord Alfred Tennyson.
The quote reads: ‘Who would be  A mermaid fair,  Singing alone,  Combing her hair’, which is written around the illustration.  More of the poem can be read from an attached label. 

BLUE AND YELLOW COLOUR
The key colour is a beautiful purple-blue, which as light travels through bone china, appears to alter with the changing light.

DIMENSIONS
½ pint capacity.  8.9 cm tall.  8.5 cm wide.

CARE INSTRUCTIONS
Dishwasher and microwave safe.  To maintain the glaze vibrancy it is preferable that a gentle detergent & short or low temperature wash program is used.

DELIVERY  
UK Standard Recorded: £3 flat delivery charge.
Outside the UK: £12 flat delivery charge. 

There's no need to worry about Christmas wrapping; if you order by December 20th you will receive a free Christmas gift box for your mugs!  

Parcels are usually posted the next working day after an order is received.  If you're in a hurry please ask for quotations for 1st Class or Next Day delivery services.


Matching gift cards and jugs are available.

name: LITERARY CARD - LEIGH HUNT'S FAIRIES
description:
Gift card printed in Wolverhampton, England.  Part of a range featuring mythical creatures accompanied by quotes from English authors & poets.  

ILLUSTRATION OF:  Two mischievous fairies stealing apples from an orchard under the cover of night.  

QUOTE/ INSPIRATION FROM:  Fairies' Song, an extract from James Leigh Hunt's (1784-1859) translation of a Latin poem by Thomas Randolph (1605-1635).  Around the illustration the quote reads:  ‘We the Fairies blithe and antic, Of dimensions not gigantic’.  

INSIDE:  Blank.  
If you order a card alongside any ceramic product and would like to have it sent directly as a gift, a message can be written inside for you at no extra cost.  (In the same style calligraphy as the quote on the front.)  Please ask when you place your order. 

DIMENSIONS
5" x 7" (12.7 cm x 17.8 cm).

UK STANDARD RECORDED DELIVERY  
Cards ordered alone: £0.90 flat delivery charge.  
Cards ordered with ceramics: No extra cost.  (£3 flat delivery charge.)

DELIVERY OUTSIDE THE UK
£12 flat delivery charge. 

Parcels are usually posted the next working day after an order is received.  Matching mugs and jugs are available.
